title: Come join oce's newest community!

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Flux esport club is an organisation which has goals set for reaching OCS next year and in the future OPL!
 
Team Flux already has a sponsored streamer who is informative, loves to entertain his viewers and runs it down mid Kappa123. 
 
https://www.twitch.tv/nexz_live
 
We currently have support staff which would love to reach out to the community and expand the following of our esports club.
Feel free to add our staff Skips and Ciphor.
 
Flux esports club can offer.
- Coaching to community members.
- Scheduled stream coaching from our sponsored streamer Nexz.
- OP.GG reviews.
- A  friendly community for passionate league of legends players to get together.
 
The requirements for joining our esports club are.
- Friendly and easy going players.
- Discord  https://discord.gg/UTYb8Ya

- Once you've joined the discord just message on of the admins and we’ll set you up! 
- RANK DOES NOT MATTER! :)
 
WELCOME TO THE COMMUNITY!


edit - discord link should be fixed
